# get_mse { #reportrabbit.get_mse }

```python
get_mse(y_true, y_pred, *, sample_weight=None)
```

Compute Mean Squared Error (MSE).

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name          | Type                             | Description              | Default    |
|---------------|----------------------------------|--------------------------|------------|
| y_true        | array-like of shape (n_samples,) | True target values.      | _required_ |
| y_pred        | array-like of shape (n_samples,) | Predicted target values. | _required_ |
| sample_weight | array-like of shape (n_samples,) | Sample weights.          | `None`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description         |
|--------|--------|---------------------|
| mse    | float  | Mean Squared Error. |
